courses.title: Introduction to Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and basic music theory.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your piano skills with advanced techniques and repertoire.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your vocal skills with exercises and techniques for beginners.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Learn the ins and outs of music production using Ableton Live.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the world of jazz improvisation and learn to create your own solos.

courses.title: Drumming Fundamentals
courses.description: Get started with drumming by learning the basic rhythms and techniques.

courses.title: Classical Music Appreciation
courses.description: Discover the beauty of classical music and learn about its history and key composers.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create electronic music using software and hardware tools.

courses.title: Songwriting Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of songwriting, including lyrics, melody, and structure.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced violin techniques and repertoire.
